alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson, northwestern Gadsden, southwestern Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 305 PM EDT/205 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chattahoochee, or 15 miles northwest of Quincy, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Bascom, Rosedale, Blue Spring, Recovery, Lovedale, Jinks, Dellwood, Star, Buena Vista, Marianna Municipal A/P, Seminole State Park, Hardin Heights and Faceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
